title: LEAGUE OF LEGENDS HAS GOTTEN SOFT.
body: look I'm here to address the rubbish ban system you have in OCE I have many accounts banned from being toxic which is FAIR yet I have not gotten any of my inting flaming former teammates banned or anything. That message pop up you get when a report was successful always the one flaming gets all the bans I fell there is no way to sugar coat how bad they are you have to say it straight yes I have tried to be nice leads to nowhere there should be a line between "KILL YOURSELF" TO "WHAT THE FUCK ARE YOU DOING THERE?!" Riot you need to address banning people in game too we don't flame for the heck of things there is a reason we are competitive too we want to win if they're inting I want them to know about it no sugar coating my message is LEAGUE OF LEGENDS HAS GOTTEN SOFT HENCE THE LACK OF COMPETITIVENESS WHICH IS DRIVING PEOPLE OUT OF THE GAME ADDRESS YOUR ISSUE PLEASE

replies.body: To me there is a clear difference between "KILL YOURSELF" and "WHAT THE FUCK ARE YOU DOING THERE?!". However riot sees both as toxicity so i guess you can't use it, who knows when the day will come back when you can question someone's actions in league and actually not get penalized.
No thanks, they target ban people who exploit their system and try to show them their system isn't working
But thats not questioning someone feeding, they only go for people who show exploits, thats different from what you asked

Your kidding right? People who give up in games all soft int/feed. That at its core is exploiting the game because they are throwing the game intentionally to get to the next game in a way that looks like they are trying. The rest of the team can;t question the soft inter or they will get punished for being *negative*
